ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, ok further investigation reveals that it *is* working if you type the /admin part of the URL - I just never do. Testing this on our main crawl machine

Hi,

ok further investigation reveals that it *is* working if you 
type the /admin part of the URL - I just never do. Testing this 
on our main crawl machine shows that its fine. 

So basically the re-direct page  from / to /admin/login.jsp 
obviously isn't pre-compiled (or whatever mechanism it uses).

Sorry this bug has been reported in dribs and drabs - I should've 
investigated more thoughly. 

cheers 

mark
